In the past six years, she’s transitioned from editorial writing for lifestyle publications to producing international news packages and developing content strategy roadmaps for multiple projects.In her previous role as senior content strategist at Seedly, she looked after its SEO efforts, moderated personal finance events, and spoke on Money.FM, a Singapore-based radio channel.Her works have been published in Time Out Singapore, Rice Media, Tech in Asia, South China Morning Post, MarinaBaySands.com, and ChannelNewsAsia.com.
